blogPost.excerpt: Need compliance solutions, but don’t want to spend thousands in legal fees? Termly’s compliance suite can help you stay up to date and compliant with privacy laws like the GDPR, CCPA, ePrivacy Regulation, and more — for FREE.
blogPost.body: Need compliance solutions, but don’t want to spend thousands in legal fees? Termly’s compliance suite can help you stay up to date and compliant with privacy laws like the GDPR, CCPA, ePrivacy Regulation, and more — for FREE.
blogPost.title: Termly.io - GDPR Compliance Solution for Small Business
blogPost.author: Nolan Clemmons

localize.description: 需要合规性解决方案，但又不想花费成千上万的法律费用？Termly的合规性套件可以帮助您保持最新状态，并遵守隐私法，如GDPR、CCPA、电子隐私条例等--免费。
需要合規性解決方案，但又不想花費成千上萬的法律費用？Termly的合規性套件可以幫助您保持最新狀態，並遵守隱私法，如GDPR、CCPA、電子隱私條例等--免費。

previous.excerpt: We help GI clinics improve outcomes by sending patients information to their phones. For example, we send colonoscopy patients instructions that help them arrive prepared.
previous.title: Gradia Health - Handcrafted healthcare information sent to patients' phones

localize.description: 我们通过向患者发送信息到他们的手机上，帮助消化道诊所改善结果。例如，我们向结肠镜检查患者发送说明，帮助他们做好准备。
localize.tagline: 手工制作的医疗信息发送到患者的手机上

localize.description: 我們通過向患者發送信息到他們的手機上，幫助消化道診所改善結果。例如，我們向結腸鏡檢查患者發送說明，幫助他們做好準備。
localize.tagline: 手工製作的醫療信息發送到患者的手機上

next.excerpt: Save your online memories with Memento. Memento uses powerful APIs to automatically categorize and organize your URLs so it's easy to search for them later on. Request access now!
next.title: Memento - Automatically categorize and organize your URLs using ML

localize.description: 用Memento保存你的在线记忆。Memento使用强大的API来自动分类和组织您的URLs，以便日后轻松搜索它们。现在就申请访问吧
localize.tagline: 使用ML对您的URL进行自动分类和组织。

localize.description: 用Memento保存你的在線記憶。Memento使用強大的API來自動分類和組織您的URLs，以便日後輕鬆搜索它們。現在就申請訪問吧
localize.tagline: 使用ML對您的URL進行自動分類和組織。
